category: Election Fair Committee Regulations/Article 1 (Establishment Basis and Name)
contents: Article 1 (Establishment basis and name) The Korea Sports Council establishes the Election Fair Committee in accordance with Article 44 of the Articles of Incorporation to promote fair management of elections for city/provincial, city/county/district sports council presidents and member sport organization heads. Revised 2020. 11. 05., 2022. 5. 10.
